title: Sensex sheds 537 pts, Nifty below 17,050; KPIT Tech rallies 13%; Bajaj Finance tanks over 7% - Economic Times
content: Sensex sheds 537 pts, Nifty below 17,050; KPIT Tech rallies 13%; Bajaj Finance tanks over 7%  Economic Times
description: Benchmark stock indices Sensex and Nifty tumbled nearly 1 per cent on Wednesday on profit booking in financial and IT stocks after a recent rally. The 30-share BSE Sensex tumbled 537.22 points or 0.94 per cent to end at 56,819.39. During the day, it tanked 772.57 points or 1.34 per cent to 56,584.04. The NSE Nifty declined by 162.40 points or 0.94 per cent to 17,038.40.
